constituent: umbrella, umbrella, assembly line, person, ten, needle, person4, assembly line2
koohiiStory1: FOUR PERSONS can fit under this UMBRELLA if they are thin as a NEEDLE.
koohiiStory2: There are two assembly lines at the umbrella factory. One is responsible for making the top of the umbrella, and the other for making the handle. The two lines cross at the end, where one man tries frantically to jam the sets of parts together.
